meanings.definition: A thick cushion used as a footstool or for kneeling.
meanings.sent1: I rested my feet on the hassock after a long day.
meanings.sent2: She placed the tray of snacks on the hassock in front of the sofa.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistook the hassock for a cozy bed and curled up on it.
meanings.sent4: The hassock was a soft cloud under my tired feet.
meanings.sent5: The colorful hassock added a cheerful touch to the room.

meanings.definition: A clump of grass or vegetation.
meanings.sent1: The hassock of grass near the pond provided a hiding spot for the frog.
meanings.sent2: The cows grazed peacefully around the hassock of greenery.
meanings.sent3: The hassock of wildflowers swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The hassock of bushes looked like a miniature forest in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The hassock of reeds rustled softly in the marsh.
